descriptor.name: Dettol Foaming Handwash Refill - Aloe Coconut, Rich Foam, Moisturizing Hand Wash, Soft On Hands, 700Ml
descriptor.short_desc: Be sure to protect your skin from germs and bacteria. Dettol foaming handwash is a moisture-rich foam that removes dirt and germs while being gentle on skin. This hand wash provides soft and rich lather, leaving behind clean hands and mild aloe coconut fragrance. Dettol handwash is dermatologically tested. Dettol handwash are free from parabens TCC and are ph balanced.

descriptor.short_desc: Colgate Plax removes over 99% of germs & helps control bad breath 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Protects against GERM build up. Provides healthier gums. No burning sensation. Gives long lasting fresh breath. Helps prevent cavities.

descriptor.name: Johnson's Baby Baby Lotion, 250 Ml
descriptor.short_desc: Johnson's baby lotion is suitable for a newborn. With 24 hour moisture, prevents moisture loss and protects baby's skin barrier. Baby soft skin, all day long, it has a non-greasy formula for quick absorption. Clinically mildness proven. It is made with natural plant oil. Recommended by doctors, it is pH balanced and hypoallergenic. No added parabens, sulfates or dyes.

descriptor.name: Johnson's Baby No More Tears Baby Shampoo, 200 Ml
descriptor.short_desc: Johnson's Baby shampoo is as gentle to the eyes as pure water. Equipped with a pump for easy usage It gently cleanses hair and is mild to eyes. Only Giggles. No More Tears. It is pH balanced and hypoallergenic. Recommended by doctors. No Parabens, No Formaldehyde, No Dye. Every Johnson’s product passes a 5 level safety assurance processes, ensuring every ingredient is safe for use.

descriptor.name: Medimix Ayurvedic Hand Wash NEEM TULSI ALOE VERA 675 ml
descriptor.short_desc: Medimix Ayurvedic Hand Wash with Neem, Tulsi, and Aloe Vera for soft, germ-free hands.
descriptor.long_desc: Medimix Ayurvedic Hand Wash combines the Power of 3 herbal actives - Neem, Tulsi, and Aloe Vera - to provide you the best natural care. It ensures 99.9% germ protection while keeping your hands soft and odor-free. Say goodbye to harmful chemical-based hand washes and embrace Fast Acting Ayurveda. Suitable for external use only. Store in a cool and dry place.

list.value: Take a pea sized drop, lather for 30 seconds and wash in running water

descriptor.name: Nestle Cerelac Baby Cereal With Milk, Wheat Apple Cherry - From 8 To 24 Months, 300 G Bag-In-Box
descriptor.short_desc: Nestle Cerelac Baby Cereal with Milk - Wheat Apple Cherry is a complementary food for babies from 8 to 24 months. While infants and children have higher requirements of nutrients than adults, 2 serves of Cerelac Wheat Apple Cherry provides 37% of a baby's daily need of iron. It is also a source of 14 important nutrients including vitamins and minerals. Nestle develops infant nutrition products backed by evolving science and research. Innovation has been at the heart of Nestle since its beginning. Optimal Preparation: Careful and hygienic preparation of Infant food is most essential for health. Do not use fewer scoops than directed, since diluted feeding will not provide adequate nutrients needed by your infant. Do not use more scoops than directed since concentrated feed will not provide the water needed by your infant. Wash and dry your hands before preparing baby's food. Make sure all utensils are thoroughly clean. Safety Warnings: Infant food should be used only on the advice of a health worker as to the need for its use and the proper method of its use. Infant food is not the sole source of nourishment for an infant. Use prepared feed within half an hour otherwise microbial deterioration may set in. Discard unused feed.
descriptor.long_desc: Nestle Cerelac Baby Cereal with Milk - Wheat Apple Cherry is a complementary food for babies from 8 to 24 months. While infants and children have higher requirements of nutrients than adults, 2 serves of Cerelac Wheat Apple Cherry provides 37% of a baby's daily need of iron. It is also a source of 14 important nutrients including vitamins and minerals. Nestle develops infant nutrition products backed by evolving science and research. Innovation has been at the heart of Nestle since its beginning. Optimal Preparation: Careful and hygienic preparation of Infant food is most essential for health. Do not use fewer scoops than directed, since diluted feeding will not provide adequate nutrients needed by your infant. Make sure all utensils are thoroughly clean. Safety Warnings: Infant food should be used only on the advice of a health worker as to the need for its use and the proper method of its use. Infant food is not the sole source of nourishment for an infant. Use prepared feed within half an hour otherwise microbial deterioration may set in. Discard unused feed.

descriptor.name: Nestle Cerelac Multigrain Dal Veg Baby Cereal With Milk From 12 Months + 300G
descriptor.short_desc: Nestle Cerelac Multigrain Dal Veg Baby Cereal with Milk, typically available in a 300-gram pack, is a nutritious and convenient baby cereal designed for infants aged 12 months and older. This cereal offers a balanced combination of multigrains, lentils, vegetables, and milk, providing essential nutrients for a growing child. Nestle Cerelac is a trusted brand in baby nutrition, and this product is a popular choice for parents looking to introduce their little ones to a wholesome and easy-to-prepare meal that supports their development and dietary needs.
descriptor.long_desc: Nestle Cerelac Multigrain Dal Veg Baby Cereal with Milk, typically available in a 300-gram pack, is a nutritious and convenient baby cereal designed for infants aged 12 months and older.
